title: TESSELLATE Watch Face
summary: Beautiful eye catching details, yet delightfully simple.
developerAddress:
909 W EUCLID AVE #1062
ARLINGTON HEIGHTS IL 60005-9998
description: TESSELLATE Watch Face, designed for Android Wear watches. Utilizing the latest Android Wear standard and API, the watch face delivers stunning style in smooth performance.- Beautifully rendered- Optimized smooth animation- Optional display of Date and Day of Week- Full color or simplified Ambient mode- For both round and square watches- Customizable Large or small peak card*Requires Android Wear 5.0+*After installation, please allow up to a minute for watch face to be available in Android Wear companion app.
descriptionHTML:
TESSELLATE Watch Face, designed for Android Wear watches. Utilizing the latest Android Wear standard and API, the watch face delivers stunning style in smooth performance.

- Beautifully rendered

- Optimized smooth animation

- Optional display of Date and Day of Week

- Full color or simplified Ambient mode

- For both round and square watches

- Customizable Large or small peak card



*Requires Android Wear 5.0+

*After installation, please allow up to a minute for watch face to be available in Android Wear companion app.
comments: Hello, just purchased this and i am not sure what i am doing wrong, i cant seem to turn on the DIM mode to only have the hands showing. for some reason i can only change the date, day of week, and smooth second hand. The notification size and Dim mode are not working :c
Perfect resolution One of my favorites and I bought a lot!
recentChanges: Added support for Android version 4.3 and up.
